General.Name: Integrated Logistics Bhd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: ILB Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the solar renewable energy business primarily in Malaysia. The company operates two solar power plants with a total capacity of 11MWac in Malaysia. It also designs, supplies, installs, and commissions a solar PV module system. The company was formerly known as Integrated Logistics Berhad and changed its name to ILB Group Berhad in May 2022. ILB Group Berhad was founded in 1973 and is based in Shah Alam, Malaysia.
